U (0, 0) -> (-1, 1) -> Corner(Ubl)
U (1, 0) -> (0, 1) -> Edge(Ub)
U (2, 0) -> (1, 1) -> Corner(Ubr)
U (0, 1) -> (-1, 0) -> Edge(Ul)
U (1, 1) -> (0, 0) -> Center(U)
U (2, 1) -> (1, 0) -> Edge(Ur)
U (0, 2) -> (-1, -1) -> Corner(Ufl)
U (1, 2) -> (0, -1) -> Edge(Uf)
U (2, 2) -> (1, -1) -> Corner(Ufr)
L (0, 0) -> (-1, 1) -> Corner(Lub)
L (1, 0) -> (0, 1) -> Edge(Lu)
L (2, 0) -> (1, 1) -> Corner(Luf)
L (0, 1) -> (-1, 0) -> Edge(Lb)
L (1, 1) -> (0, 0) -> Center(L)
L (2, 1) -> (1, 0) -> Edge(Lf)
L (0, 2) -> (-1, -1) -> Corner(Ldb)
L (1, 2) -> (0, -1) -> Edge(Ld)
L (2, 2) -> (1, -1) -> Corner(Ldf)
F (0, 0) -> (-1, 1) -> Corner(Ful)
F (1, 0) -> (0, 1) -> Edge(Fu)
F (2, 0) -> (1, 1) -> Corner(Fur)
F (0, 1) -> (-1, 0) -> Edge(Fl)
F (1, 1) -> (0, 0) -> Center(F)
F (2, 1) -> (1, 0) -> Edge(Fr)
F (0, 2) -> (-1, -1) -> Corner(Fdl)
F (1, 2) -> (0, -1) -> Edge(Fd)
F (2, 2) -> (1, -1) -> Corner(Fdr)
R (0, 0) -> (-1, 1) -> Corner(Ruf)
R (1, 0) -> (0, 1) -> Edge(Ru)
R (2, 0) -> (1, 1) -> Corner(Rub)
R (0, 1) -> (-1, 0) -> Edge(Rf)
R (1, 1) -> (0, 0) -> Center(R)
R (2, 1) -> (1, 0) -> Edge(Rb)
R (0, 2) -> (-1, -1) -> Corner(Rdf)
R (1, 2) -> (0, -1) -> Edge(Rd)
R (2, 2) -> (1, -1) -> Corner(Rdb)
B (0, 0) -> (-1, 1) -> Corner(Bur)
B (1, 0) -> (0, 1) -> Edge(Bu)
B (2, 0) -> (1, 1) -> Corner(Bul)
B (0, 1) -> (-1, 0) -> Edge(Br)
B (1, 1) -> (0, 0) -> Center(B)
B (2, 1) -> (1, 0) -> Edge(Bl)
B (0, 2) -> (-1, -1) -> Corner(Bdr)
B (1, 2) -> (0, -1) -> Edge(Bd)
B (2, 2) -> (1, -1) -> Corner(Bdl)
D (0, 0) -> (-1, 1) -> Corner(Dfl)
D (1, 0) -> (0, 1) -> Edge(Df)
D (2, 0) -> (1, 1) -> Corner(Dfr)
D (0, 1) -> (-1, 0) -> Edge(Dl)
D (1, 1) -> (0, 0) -> Center(D)
D (2, 1) -> (1, 0) -> Edge(Dr)
D (0, 2) -> (-1, -1) -> Corner(Dbl)
D (1, 2) -> (0, -1) -> Edge(Db)
D (2, 2) -> (1, -1) -> Corner(Dbr)
